languages.text: "Но затем на пути их встала раса богопротивных ксеносов. Кровь полилась реками. Голгенна Анжуйский скончался в своей ставке, поход был на грани краха, но... недруг нежданно помог нам".

traits.locale_text: "Но затем на пути их встала богопротивных ксеносов, чьи планеты были известны как Адские миры. Кровь полилась реками. Голгенна Анжуйский скончался в своей ставке, поход был на грани краха, но... недруг нежданно помог нам".

languages.text: "But then they encountered a race of unholy xenos. Rivers of blood flowed. Golgenna Angevin died in his headquarters, the crusade was about to crumble, but then... we received unexpected help from a foe."
languages.original_text: "Но затем на пути их встала раса богопротивных ксеносов. Кровь полилась реками. Голгенна Анжуйский скончался в своей ставке, поход был на грани краха, но... недруг нежданно помог нам".

traits.locale_text: "But then they encountered a race of unholy xenos whose planets were known as the Hell Worlds. Blood flowed in rivers. Golgenna Angevin died in his headquarters, the Crusade was about to crumble, but then... we received unexpected help from a foe."

"But then they encountered a race of unholy xenos whose planets were known as the Hell Worlds. Blood flowed in rivers. Golgenna Angevin died in his headquarters, the Crusade was about to crumble, but then... we received unexpected help from a foe."

"But then they encountered a race of unholy xenos whose planets were known as the Hell Worlds. Rivers of blood flowed. Golgenna Angevin died in his headquarters, the crusade was about to crumble, but then... we received unexpected help from a foe."

"But then they encountered a race of unholy xenos whose planets were known as the Hell Worlds. Rivers of blood flowed. Golgenna Angevin died in his headquarters, the crusade was about to crumble, but then... we received unexpected help from a foe."

"But then they encountered a race of unholy xenos. Rivers of blood flowed. Golgenna Angevin died in his headquarters, the crusade was about to crumble, but then... we received unexpected help from a foe."

languages.text: “但在那之后，他们却遭遇了某个邪恶的异形族群。那场战斗血流成河，戈尔根纳·安杰文在总部阵亡，远征即将溃败，但随后……我们从某位敌人那里得到了意外的援助。”
languages.original_text: "But then they encountered a race of unholy xenos. Rivers of blood flowed. Golgenna Angevin died in his headquarters, the crusade was about to crumble, but then... we received unexpected help from a foe."

traits.locale_text: “但在那之后，他们却遭遇了某个邪恶的异形族群，那些异型来自被称为‘地狱群界’的行星。那场战斗血流成河，戈尔根纳·安杰文在总部阵亡，远征即将溃败，但随后……我们从某位敌人那里得到了意外的援助。”

languages.text: «No obstante, después se toparon con una raza de xenos profanos. Corrieron ríos de sangre. Golgenna Angevin murió en su sede y la cruzada estuvo a punto de desmoronarse, hasta que... recibimos ayuda inesperada por parte de un enemigo».
languages.original_text: "But then they encountered a race of unholy xenos. Rivers of blood flowed. Golgenna Angevin died in his headquarters, the crusade was about to crumble, but then... we received unexpected help from a foe."

traits.locale_text: «No obstante, después se toparon con una raza de xenos profanos que moraban en unos planetas conocidos como Mundos Infernales. Corrieron ríos de sangre. Golgenna Angevin murió en su sede y la cruzada estuvo a punto de desmoronarse, hasta que... recibimos ayuda inesperada por parte de un enemigo».

languages.text: 「しかし、彼らは後に不浄な異種族と遭遇しました。血は川のごとく流れ、ゴルゲンナ・アンジェヴィンは本部で死亡し、十字軍が崩壊の危機に瀕した時…敵から予期せぬ援助があったのです」
languages.original_text: "But then they encountered a race of unholy xenos. Rivers of blood flowed. Golgenna Angevin died in his headquarters, the crusade was about to crumble, but then... we received unexpected help from a foe."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、彼らは後に不浄な異種族と遭遇しました。血は川のごとく流れ、ゴルゲンナ・アンジェヴィンは本部で死亡し、十字軍が崩壊の危機に瀕した時…敵から予期せぬ援助があったのです」

languages.text: "Doch dann stießen sie auf ein Volk unheiliger Xenos. Ströme von Blut wurden vergossen. Golgenna Angevin starb in seinem Hauptquartier, der Kreuzzug drohte zu scheitern ... doch dann erhielten wir unerwartet Hilfe von einem Gegner."
languages.original_text: "But then they encountered a race of unholy xenos. Rivers of blood flowed. Golgenna Angevin died in his headquarters, the crusade was about to crumble, but then... we received unexpected help from a foe."

traits.locale_text: "Doch dann stießen sie auf ein Volk unheiliger Xenos, deren Planeten als Höllenwelten bekannt waren. Ganze Ströme von Blut wurden vergossen. Golgenna Angevin starb in seinem Hauptquartier, der Kreuzzug drohte zu scheitern ... doch dann erhielten wir unerwartet Hilfe von einem Gegner."

languages.text: « Mais un jour, ces braves croisèrent la route d'un groupe de xénos hérétiques. Le sang coula à flots. Golgenna Angevin mourut dans son quartier général, et la croisade était sur le point de s'effondrer, lorsque tout à coup... nous reçûmes l'aide inattendue d'un adversaire. »
languages.original_text: "But then they encountered a race of unholy xenos. Rivers of blood flowed. Golgenna Angevin died in his headquarters, the crusade was about to crumble, but then... we received unexpected help from a foe."

traits.locale_text: « Mais un jour, ces braves croisèrent la route d'un groupe de xénos hérétiques dont les planètes étaient surnommées des "mondes infernaux". Le sang coula à flots. Golgenna Angevin mourut dans son quartier général, et la croisade était sur le point de s'effondrer, lorsque tout à coup... nous reçûmes l'aide inattendue d'un adversaire. »

languages.text: "Sonrasında dinsiz bir zeno ırkıyla karşılaşıldı. Oluk oluk kan aktı. Golgenna Angevin, karargâhında öldü. Sefer darmadağın olmak üzereydi ki bir düşmanımızdan beklenmedik bir yardım gördük."
languages.original_text: "But then they encountered a race of unholy xenos. Rivers of blood flowed. Golgenna Angevin died in his headquarters, the crusade was about to crumble, but then... we received unexpected help from a foe."

traits.locale_text: "Ardından ise dinsiz bir zeno ırkıyla karşılaştılar. Oluk oluk kan aktı. Golgenna Angevin karargâhında öldü, sefer darmadağın olmak üzereydi ama sonra düşmanlarımızın birinden beklenmedik bir yardım aldık."
